# Template: Initial Client Instruction Note

<!-- This template provides a framework for recording initial client instructions in contentious probate matters -->

## Usage Instructions

<!-- TODO: Add detailed usage guidance -->

**Purpose:** To comprehensively record initial client instructions and case details  
**When to use:** Following the first substantive client meeting or telephone conference  
**Important:** Customize all sections for the specific matter. Remove placeholder text and instructions.

### Type of Claim

- [ ] Undue influence

- [ ] Non-compliance with formalities (Wills Act 1837)
- [ ] Inheritance Act claim (family provision)
- [ ] Executor/administrator misconduct
- [ ] Construction/interpretation of will
- [ ] Proprietary estoppel
- [ ] Other: [Specify]
